etomica.veos

Class BigValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.veos.BigValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBigValue

    public class BigValue
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBigValue
    Data class to handle operations involving large numbers. Stores a value as the logarithm of its magnitude, and supports operations to add, multiply, etc. with other instances. Handles positive and negative values by keeping a separate field indicating sign of value. References to "value" in the comments indicate the value in its true form, not as logarithm.

      • TEln

        public void TEln(double lnx)
        Times-equals (*=) operation, multiplying by a value given as its logarithm. Value (i.e., the value whose log is given as the argument) is assumed to be positive.
